title: Echoes of the Past
description: My first hackathon, desktop app displaying heritage sites around Vancouver to encourage exploration post-pandemic

title: Pantry Planner
description: Web app aimed to reduce food waste by suggesting recipes based on available ingredients

title: D&D Spellbook
description: Web app that stores and displays spells used by various spellcasters in the table-top roleplaying game, Dungeons and Dragons

title: Movie Watchlist
description: Desktop app listing and saving shows and movies a user has watched in the past and present
